array.name: questions
array.item: $\\mathrm{ Solve\\space the\\space equation\\space}$ $ \\colorbox{#eeeeee}{$4 \\cos x-2 \\cos 2 x=3$ for $0^{\\circ} \\leq x \\leq \\pi$}$.

$\\mathrm{ (a)\\space If\\space }$ $ \\colorbox{#eeeeee}{$\\log _{b} a=x$}$ $\\mathrm{ ,\\space show\\space that\\space}$ $ \\colorbox{#eeeeee}{$b=a^{\\frac{1}{x}}$}$ $\\mathrm{ and\\space deduce\\space that\\space}$ $ \\colorbox{#eeeeee}{$\\log _{a} b=\\frac{1}{\\log _{b} a}$}\\\\$ $\\space$ $\\space$ $\\mathrm{ (b)\\space Solve\\space }$ $\\\\$ $\\space$ $\\space$ $\\space$ $\\space$ $\\mathrm{ (i)\\space}$ $ \\colorbox{#eeeeee}{$\\log _{n} 4+\\log _{4} n^{2}=3$}\\\\$ $\\space$ $\\space$ $\\space$ $\\space$ $\\mathrm{ (ii)\\space}$ $ \\colorbox{#eeeeee}{$2^{2 x-1}+\\frac{3}{2}=2^{x+1}$}$
